metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11831 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The PharStreamWrapper (aka phar-stream-wrapper) package 2.x before 2.1.1 and 3.x before 3.1.1 for TYPO3 does not prevent directory traversal, which allows attackers to bypass a deserialization protection mechanism, as demonstrated by a phar:///path/bad.phar/../good.phar URL.

notes.Note: ccdm94> according to Drupal's advisory, versions 7.x until 7.67 are affected.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
